text: Pickpocket is a 1959 French crime drama movie directed by Robert Bresson and starring Martin LaSalle, Marika Green, Jean Pélégri, Pierre Étaix, Henri Kassagi, Pierre Leymarie. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 crime movies Category:1959 drama movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Bresson Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies about atonement Category:Movies about theft
title: Pickpocket (movie)
